definition: Leonardo da Vinci (1452-1519), Italian Renaissance painter (Tw)
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: No-one knows what da Vinci actually intended.
sentences.chinese: 没有人知道达文西是否真的是故意这样子画的。

sentences.english: The art teacher gave us a general idea of Da Vinci's paintings today.
sentences.chinese: 美术老师今天介绍我们达文西绘画的概念。

sentences.english: Discuss Leonardo's influence on the world we live in.
sentences.chinese: 讨论达文西对我们生活的世界产生了甚么影响。

sentences.english: It's like you have a Picasso or a an other Da Vinci.
sentences.chinese: 就像你手上带著毕卡索或是达文西一样。

sentences.english: Da Vinci urinates , turns back, and salutes the general.
sentences.chinese: 达文西拉完小便，转回身，敬礼。
